title: Raaga Mallika Haaram - A Symphony of Gemstones
materials: Pink Tourmaline. Featuring a Hyderabadi Polish for a rich
features: This opulent Haaram features a cascading design of gemstone beads meticulously strung together. The focal point is a central floral motif encrusted with Polki diamonds, a vibrant Emerald centerpiece, and delicate pearl accents. Smaller Ruby and Gold bird motifs are interspersed throughout the cascading strands, adding a touch of whimsy. The necklace culminates in Amethyst and Pink Tourmaline drops, creating a stunning Ombre effect. The beadwork is crafted with exceptional precision for a seamless and elegant drape.
colors: A vibrant palette of Emerald Green
complemented by the rich yellow of 22K gold. The contrasting colors create a visually stunning and unforgettable piece.
occasions: Perfect for grand occasions like weddings (vivaham)
and high-profile events. Also suitable for milestone celebrations (Jubilees)
or as a statement piece for cultural festivals. A modern interpretation of traditional elegance.
description: This Raaga Mallika Haaram is a true masterpiece, blending traditional South Indian craftsmanship with a modern sensibility. The use of high-quality gemstones, the meticulous attention to detail, and the vibrant color palette make this necklace a timeless investment. A symbol of prosperity and grace, this Haaram will be cherished for generations. Each gemstone is hand-selected for its brilliance and clarity.
